text: Niscaya allahâ€Œ muminadera kacha theke tadera jibana o sampada kine niyechena (era binimaye) ye, tadera jan'ya ache jannata. Tara allahâ€Œra pathe yud'dha kare, atahpara tara mare o mare. Ta'orata, inajila o kura'ane e samparke tadera haka oyada rayeche. Ara nija pratijna palane allahara ceye sresthatara ke ache? Sutaram tomara ye sa'oda karecha se sa'odara jan'ya anandita ha'o. Ara seta'i to mahasaphalya
